'''Amon Hen''' can refer to:
==Middle-earth==
*'''[[Amon Hen]]''', the [[Sindarin]] name for the Hill of Sight, the location of the [[Breaking of the Fellowship]].
==Adaptations==
*"[[Amon Hen (soundtrack)|Amon Hen]]", a track from the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack|Original Soundtrack]] to ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.

==Fandom==
*''[[Amon Hen (journal)]]'', a bi-monthly journal published by [[The Tolkien Society]].
